cr_color_block2 <- function() {
  theme_minimal(base_size = 13) +
    theme(
      legend.title = element_blank(),
      legend.position = "top",
      axis.text.x = element_text(angle = 45, hjust = 0),
      strip.background = element_blank(),
      strip.text = element_text(size = 13, face = "bold.italic"),
      panel.grid = element_blank()
    )
}

cr_color_block <- function() {
  theme_classic() +
    theme(
      legend.title = element_blank(),
      legend.position = "top",
      strip.text = element_text(size = 10, face = "bold.italic"),
      strip.background = element_rect(color = "white", size = 0),
      axis.line = element_blank(),
      axis.ticks = element_blank(),
      axis.title = element_blank(),
      axis.text = element_text(size = 9, face = "bold.italic"),
      axis.text.x = element_text(size = 9, face = "bold.italic", angle = 90),
      plot.title = element_text(face = "bold", size = 14, hjust = 0.5),
      plot.subtitle = element_text(face = "bold", size = 10, hjust = 0.5),
      plot.caption = element_text(size = 8)
    )
}

cr_grid <- function() {
  theme_light() +
    theme(
      legend.title = element_blank(),
      legend.position = "bottom",
      strip.text = element_text(size = 10, face = "bold.italic"),
      strip.background = element_rect(color = "white", linewidth = 0),
      axis.line.y = element_blank(),
      axis.ticks.y = element_blank(),
      axis.title = element_blank(),
      axis.text = element_text(size = 9, face = "bold.italic"),
      plot.title = element_text(face = "bold", size = 14, hjust = 0.5),
      plot.subtitle = element_text(face = "bold.italic", size = 12,
                                   hjust = 0.5),
      panel.border = element_rect(colour = "blue", fill = NA, linetype = 2),
      panel.background = element_rect(fill = "aliceblue"),
      panel.grid.major.x = element_line(colour = "steelblue", linetype = 3,
                                        size = 0.5),
      panel.grid.minor.x = element_blank(),
      panel.grid.major.y =  element_line(colour = "steelblue", linetype = 3,
                                         size = 0.5),
      panel.grid.minor.y = element_blank()
    )
}

bbarplot <- function(data, x, y, fill, facet, label,
                     xlab = "年份", ylab = "发病数/死亡数",
                     title = "历年发病数(死亡数)变化情况",
                     caption = "caption") {
  ggplot(data, aes(x = factor({{x}}), y = {{y}})) +
    geom_bar(aes(fill = {{fill}}), stat = "identity", position = "dodge") +
    facet_grid({{facet}}, scales = "free_y") +
    geom_text(aes(label = {{y}}), vjust = 2, color = "white", size = 2.5) +
    geom_text(aes(label = {{label}}), vjust = 4, color = "black", size = 2.5) +
    theme_classic() +
    xlab(xlab) +
    ylab(ylab) +
    labs(title = title, caption = caption) +
    theme(
      legend.position = "none",
      strip.text = element_text(size = 10, face = "bold.italic"),
      strip.background = element_rect(color = "white", linewidth = 0),
      axis.text = element_text(size = 10),
      axis.text.x = element_text(angle = 90, hjust = 1),
      axis.title = element_text(size = 12, face = "bold"),
      plot.title = element_text(face = "bold", size = 14, hjust = 0.5)
    )
}

bscatter <- function(data, x, y, fill, label, facet,
                     xlab = "年份",
                     ylab = "部位",
                     title = "",
                     caption = "") {
  ggplot(data, aes(x = {{x}}, y = {{y}})) +
    geom_tile(aes(fill = {{fill}})) +
    geom_text(aes(label = {{label}}), vjust = 1.5, color = "black",
              size = 2.5) +
    scale_x_discrete(position = "top") +
    scale_fill_gradient(low = "white", high = "purple") +
    facet_wrap({{facet}}, strip.position = "bottom") +
    labs(x = xlab, y = ylab, title = title, caption = caption) +
    cr_color_block()
}


theme_report <- function(
    ft,
    blank_i = NULL,
    blank_j = NULL
    ) {
  border_thick <- fp_border_default(width = 1)
  border_thin  <- fp_border_default(width = 0.5)

  n_head <- nrow_part(ft, "header")
  n_body <- nrow_part(ft, "body")
  ft <- border_remove(ft)
  for (i in 1:n_head) {
    top_border <- if (i == 1) border_thick else border_thin
    ft <- border(
      ft,
      i = i,
      border.top = top_border,
      part = "header")
  }

  ft <- border(
    ft,
    i = n_head,
    border.bottom = border_thin,
    part = "header")
    
  if (!is.null(blank_i)) {
    ft <- border(
      ft,
      i = blank_i,
      j = blank_j,
      border.top = border_none,
      part = "header")
  }

  ft <- border(
    ft,
    i = n_body,
    border.bottom = border_thick,
    part = "body")
  return(ft)
}

### 年龄别癌症发病率(图示)

年龄别癌症发病率是评估肿瘤登记数据质量的重要指标之一。不同癌种具有各自特有的年龄变化模式。对于大多数癌种，如肺癌、食管癌和胃癌，0–39 岁人群的发病率较低，而在 40 岁以后，发病率会随着年龄增加而迅速上升。相较之下，乳腺癌和甲状腺癌的发病高峰多集中在 50–55 岁年龄组左右。若某登记处的年龄别癌症发病率明显偏离这些预期的年龄变化趋势，可能提示其数据存在质量问题。

1. 若发现某年龄组的发病率出现异常波动（与预期的年龄变化模式不符），可能提示存在数据质量问题。例如，在应呈上升趋势的老年年龄段中，发病率却意外下降，可能表明该年龄组存在发病病例的漏报。
1. 若发病率异常波动但发病病例数与往年相差不大，则可能提示该年度该年龄组的人口数据存在偏差或录入错误。( @fig-inci-age)

```{r}
#| label: fig-inci-age
#| fig-cap: !expr 'paste0(ana_year, "年", name, "主要部位恶性肿瘤年龄别发病率")'
#| fig-height: 10
#| fig-width: 8
agerate <- create_age_rate(fbsw, year, sex, cancer) |>
  filter(!sex == 0, year == ana_year) |>
  drop_others() |>
  add_labels(vars = "sex") |> 
  add_labels(vars = "cancer", label_type = "abbr", as_factor = FALSE) |> 
  mutate(agegrp = as.numeric(agegrp)) |>
  mutate(agegrp = as.numeric(as.character(factor(agegrp,
                                                 levels = 1:19,
                                                 labels = c(0, 1,
                                                            seq(5, 85, 5))))))

cancers <- asr1 |> filter(sex == 0, rank <= 9) |> pull(cancer)
#cancers <- cancers[1:12]
agerate |>
  filter(cancer %in% cancers) |>
  draw_linechart(x = agegrp, y = rate, group = sex_cn, grid = c(4, 3),
                 facet = cancer_cn, axis_label = c("年龄", "发病率(1/10万)"),
                 main=cancer_cn, cols = c("blue", "red"))
```

## 主要质量控制指标
### 病理诊断比例(MV%)变化

病理诊断比例（MV%）是评价数据有效性指标之一，MV%越高提示病例数据来源的准确性越高，但同时，MV%可以间接用来评价肿瘤登记数据的完整性。MV%通常与一个地区的医疗水平、癌症诊断能力等相关，社会经济、医疗水平相似的地区，MV%也很相近，如果登记处MV%与区域的标准存在较大差异，提示数据质量可能存在问题。

$$ MV=\frac{时期内病理学确诊癌症病例数}{时期内所有癌症新发病例数}*100 $$

1. 过高的MV%提示登记处的病例来源过度依赖组织学、细胞学及血液学诊断，其他途径病例发现来源缺乏或不完善（完整性存在问题，漏报！）。
1. 过低的MV%提示登记处的病例有效性不足。

```{r}
#| label: fig-mv-year
#| fig-cap: !expr 'paste0(ana_year, "年", name, "主要部位恶性肿瘤历年病理诊断比例变化")'
#| fig-height: 10
#| fig-width: 10
qua2 <- create_quality(fbsw, year, sex, cancer) |>
  add_labels(label_type = "abbr") |>
  drop_others()
qua2 |>
  filter(!sex == "合计") |>
  bscatter(x = factor(year), y = cancer_cn, fill = mv, label = mv, facet = ~ sex_cn,
           title = "历年病理诊断比例（MV%）变化情况",
           xlab = "年份",
           caption = "黑色标签值为病理诊断比例（%）")
```

### 死亡发病比（M:I）

> 死亡发病比（M:I）是癌症发病率与癌症死亡率的比值，其值大小通常与癌症5年生存率相关。M:I越小，则癌症预后越好，生存率越高；M:I越大，则癌症预后越差，生存率越低。

$$ M:I=\frac{时期内癌症死亡数}{时期内新发病例数} $$

1. M:I相对过大，提示*发病登记可能存在漏报*，同时还要考虑生命统计的数据完整性和有效性问题；
1. M:I相对过小，提示发病数据中有*重复记录*可能或*死亡漏报*；
1. M:I值大小与生存率以及 死亡证书质量（根本死因的准确性）相关；
1. M:I值应该与相似地区M:I值相近，不同年份之间M:I值不会有大的波动。


```{r}
qua2 |>
  filter(!sex == 0) |>
  select(year, cancer_cn, sex, mi) |>
  ggplot(aes(x = factor(year), y = cancer_cn)) +
  geom_tile(aes(fill = mi)) +
  scale_x_discrete(position = "top") +
  geom_text(aes(label = mi), vjust = 0.5, color = "black",  size = 2.5) +
  scale_fill_gradient(low = "white", high = "darkred") +
  facet_wrap(~sex,  strip.position = "bottom") +
  ggtitle("历年死亡发病比（M:I）变化情况") +
  cr_color_block()

```

```{r}
qua2 |>
  filter(sex == 0, year == ana_year) |>
  mutate(area_type = classify_areacode(areacode)$area_type) |>
  select(area_type, cancer_cn, cancer, mi) |>
  left_join(stdd, by = c("area_type", "cancer")) |>
  draw_dumbbell(x = cancer_cn, y1 = mi.x, y2 = mi.y, topn = 24)
```


### 只有死亡医学证明书比例(DCO%)


:::{.callout-important}
## 提示
只有死亡医学证明书比例（DCO%）”是反映死亡补发病流程的关键指标之一。当某一病例仅来自全死因死亡数据，且无法通过常规病例发现途径获取其发病日期等相关信息时，便以其死亡日期作为发病日期进行记录，此类病例被称为 DCO 病例。DCO 病例在全部病例中所占的比例即为 DCO%。该指标用于评价数据的有效性，其数值越高，说明依赖死亡信息补发病的比例越大，数据有效性越低；反之，DCO% 越低，数据的有效性越高。
:::

1. 如果所有部位的DCO%均为0，则提示可能未开展死亡补发病流程，数据完整性可能存在问题。
1. 如果部分部位的DCO%比例超过10%，则提示未能有效追踪相关发病信息。



```{r}
qua2 |>
  filter(!sex == "合计") |>
  select(year, cancer_cn, sex, dco) |>
  ggplot(aes(x = factor(year), y = cancer_cn)) +
  geom_tile(aes(fill = dco)) +
  scale_x_discrete(position = "top") +
  geom_text(aes(label = dco), vjust = 0.5, color = "black", size = 2.5) +
  scale_fill_gradient(low = "white", high = "darkred") +
  facet_wrap(~sex,  strip.position = "bottom") +
  labs(title = "只有死亡医学证明书比例（DCO%）变化情况",
       subtitle = "稳定性评价") +
  cr_color_block()
```
